name: Ext_R2_AllergyIntolerance_re_certainty
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.AllergyIntolerance.reaction.certainty for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents AllergyIntolerance.reaction.certainty from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AllergyIntolerance|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: unlikely | likely | confirmed - clinical certainty about the specific substance
element.definition: Statement about the degree of clinical certainty that the specific substance was the cause of the manifestation in this reaction event.
element.comment: `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.extension` maps to R4 `AllergyIntolerance.reaction.extension`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
